title: Unitary no constitutional auth. to subnatl. govt.

content.question: Unitary systems differ from federal systems in that unitary systems

choices.label: are found only in liberal democracies
guarantee no constitutional authority to subnational governments
give more power to subnational governments than to national governments

content.answer: guarantee no constitutional authority to subnational governments

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
